ComicInfo.Summary:
SERIES FINALE
Crusaders and heretics stand together in a battle for salvation and survival against demonic visitors from beyond the stars in this, the terrifying and devastating finale of LAKE OF FIRE.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Matt Smith & Nathan Fairbairn | 1 | | B | Cover B | Bryan Lee O'Malley & Jason Fischer | 2 |
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bryan Lee O'Malley,Jason Fischer,Matt Smith,Nathan Fairbairn
